00104 inline void FloatHistogram1D::fill(Float_t value, Float_t weight)
00105 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00106   throw(std::range_error)
00107 #endif
00108 {
00109   UInt_t bin_index=binIndex(value);
00110   addToBinContent(bin_index,weight);
00111   addToEntries(weight);
00112 }
00113 
00114 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00115 inline void FloatHistogram1D::rangeCheck(UInt_t bin_index) const
00116   throw(std::range_error)
00117 {
00118   if ( bin_index + kNHistogram1DFloats >= (UInt_t) _obj->getNFloat() ) {
00119     std::stringstream message;
00120     message << "Range error accessing bin " << bin_index << " of histogram " << id() << "which has" << nBins() << ".";
00121     throw std::range_error(message.str());
00122   }
00123 }
00124 #endif  
00125 
00126 inline void FloatHistogram1D::addToBinContent(UInt_t bin_index, Float_t value)
00127 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00128   throw(std::range_error)
00129 #endif
00130 {
00131 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00132   rangeCheck(bin_index);
00133 #endif
00134   _obj->setFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram1DFloats,binContent(bin_index)+value);
00135 }
00136 
00137 inline void FloatHistogram1D::setBinContent(UInt_t bin_index, Float_t value)
00138 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00139   throw(std::range_error)
00140 #endif
00141 {
00142 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00143   rangeCheck(bin_index);
00144 #endif
00145   _obj->setFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram1DFloats,value);
00146 }
00147 
00148 inline Float_t FloatHistogram1D::binContent(UInt_t bin_index) const
00149 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00150   throw(std::range_error)
00151 #endif
00152 {
00153 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00154   rangeCheck(bin_index);
00155 #endif
00156   return _obj->getFloatVal(bin_index+kNHistogram1DFloats);
00157 }

00159 }
